mapper.select:
select
distinct
from T_MEMBER_REPAIR
and rownum<100
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_MEMBER_REPAIR (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NO, MOBILE, NAME, GENDER, BIRTHDAY, REGIST_TYPE, REGIST_CHNID, REGIST_OP_NO, REGIST_OP_NAME, REGIST_CINEMA_ID, STATUS, ISDELETE, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, VERSION, EMAIL, ISCONTACTABLE, PHONE, FAV_CINEMA_ID, SOURCE_TYPE, REGIST_DATE, CHANGE_STATUS_RESION, HIS_MEMBER_NO, BIRTHDAY_YEAR, BIRTHDAY_MONTH, BIRTHDAY_DAY, IS_HISTORY, REGIST_OP_SYS, BIRTHDAY_UPDATE_TIME, IS_REPAIRED ) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{registType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{registChnid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registOpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registOpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registCinemaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iscontactable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{favCinemaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{changeStatusResion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hisMemberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdayYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdayMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdayDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registOpSys,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthdayUpdateTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isRepaired,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
